Posts.Content: hi Helen, thanks for replying. good luck! i hope all goes as well as it can.  i do not currently have cancer so hoping fo keep my nipple! oh ok, well its good the photos are positive! as yesterday was my first appointment, i was taken back my all the info so didnt even think about asking to see photos, wish i had. i felt ok about it but now seeing the photos i googled, im really freaking out. im happy your surgeon has amazing results though! haha its great, sisters! yes the no feeling and coldness is somthing to think about!  thanks for your help xx
Posts.Title: masterctomy and reconstruction

Posts.Content: hello amelie, thanks for responding yeah its a pretty big decision, im really worried. do you mind i ask if you already had cancer present before your matectomy?  so happy you had a positive experience with a pleasing outcome. did they replace the nipple or are you still without? its amazing what they can do these days! yeah i have pretty small boobs too, but my surgeon suggested implants as they dont think i have enough tissue unfortunately. thankyou, i will take time and get more information.  im glad your happy with your results, good luck xx
Posts.Title: masterctomy and reconstruction

Posts.Content: hello Helen, yes i have, thanks for that, i will look into it! xx
Posts.Title: masterctomy and reconstruction

Posts.Content: hi everyone, ive never done this before, but just wondered if anyoens had done what im going to have. im 23 and having an mastectomy and breast reconstruction within the next few months, has anyone had this? does anyone have any photos? the surgeon said i would keep my nipple and skin, and would be cut under the breast. however when i googled results all the images were different. does anyone have first hand experience, how does it feel after? how do you feel? thanks for your help.
